ClassDesc: Interface for receiving notification when a child of this ViewGroup has been selected. There are two methods: {link @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#OnChildViewHolderSelectedListener#onChildViewHolderSelected_E@} is called when the view holder is about to be selected. The listener could change size of the view holder in this callback. {link @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#OnChildViewHolderSelectedListener#onChildViewHolderSelectedAndPositioned_E@ is called when view holder has been selected and laid out in RecyclerView.
